channel.title: Frost blades - Simply the best
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gYRaQ.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QdOe3.png[/img][b][url=http://frostblades.no-ip.biz/play/] Play Now[/url][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QoTtc.gif[/img][b][url=http://frostblades.no-ip.biz/highscores/] Hiscores[/url][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/aq866.png[/img][b][url=http://fb639.smfnew.com/] Community[/url][/b] [img]http://s.ytimg.com/yt/favicon-refresh-vfldLzJxy.ico[/img][b][url=http://youtube.com/pvmviper] YouTube[/url][/b]
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/I3H5Dx.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[COLOR=teal]Features:[/COLOR] [COLOR=teal]Frost blades server:[/COLOR] [COLOR=magenta]- We are a brand new Economically based server, We have thousands of features, a 'perfect' pvp system, Loyalty programme, and much more![/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]PvP/Pking:[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- We have a PERFECTED Pvp sysem - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking - Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds) - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]PvM: [/COLOR][COLOR=blue]- King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon) - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows - All other God-wars bosses! - Duel arena - Castle Wars[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]PvP And PvM:[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=cyan][SIZE=5]Grand Exchange[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- MySql Database - like RuneScape - Saves offers on logout - like RuneScape - Able to exchange offers when one player is offline, e.g have different timezone trading - like RuneScape - Fixed prices for every item - like RuneScape[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red][SIZE=5]Highscores[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]- Can Search a player on the search box - Like RuneScape - Works for EVERY skills - like RuneScape - Can compare your skills with other players skills - Bringing minigames to it soon, like Duel Arena rating[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Skills:[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- Attack - Strength - Defence - Ranged - Magic - RuneCrafting - Construction - Dungeoneering - Proper Tokens system and a shop! - Constitution - Agility - Herblore - Thieving - Crafting - Fletching - Slayer - Hunter - Mining - Smithing - Fishing - Cooking - FireMaking - WoodCutting[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- Farming[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- Summoning[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Monsters:[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- TzTok-Jad - Haar'Aken - WildyWyem - Ice Strykewyrm - Glacors - Kalphite Queen - Kree'Arra - Nex - General Graardor - Commander Zilyana - K'ril Tsutsaroth - Frost Dragons - King Black Dragon - Dagannoth Kings - Corporeal Beast - Tormented Deamons[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- Queen Black Dragon[/color]
[COLOR=blue]Minigames:[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- Barrows - Castle Wars - Combat Titans (Custom minigame) - Dominion Tower - Duel Arena - Fight Pits - Warriors guild[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- Soul Wars - Tzhaar Fight Caves (All 64 Waves, the 64th wave is for the kiln cape but is optional.) - Fight Pits[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- Pest Control[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- Clan Wars[/COLOR]
[SPOILER=MiniGames Pictures] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/4ui0k5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/148dopz.jpg[/img] [SIZE="5"][COLOR=blue]As you can see its still a work-in-progress.[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/333b97d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2luzztu.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER]
[COLOR=blue]Others:[/COLOR] [COLOR=green] - Grave Stones - Frost points - Points you can use to buy items, can be obtained through various activities on the server. - More Auras - Decanting - Flasks - Potions with 6 Doses. - Bones-on-Altar - Effigies - Full Quick Chat - All Spells in the ancients Spell book - Trading - Dicing - Curses & Prayers - Perfect combat, 100% flawless - Armour set effects all added - Flawless Music & Sound system - Full Completionists cape[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Quests:[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Lost City[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GTLRw.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
[Spoiler=Other Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kCWlz.png[/img] Spins can be earned by doing various activities in-game, e.g Quests. [img]http://i.imgur.com/OFVVq.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NIm0s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hGyo8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AFsGS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HcDQH.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/opflh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lmmYJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dDhLS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KuIHU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SauuR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dnZCK.png?1[/img] [/spoiler]
[COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"]Website Features:[/COLOR]
[COLOR="Lime"]Player Count RuneScape-Like Website Poll HighScores Logo Account Creation MySql Account Creation Avatars for Logins WebClient Forums[/COLOR] [COLOR="Yellow"]Account Management Adventure Logs - Proper 100% RS-like, no Xlite Bullshit (no offence) Online Password Changing Avatars for Logins[/COLOR] [COLOR="Red"]Ingame Picture Taking Hall-Of-Fame - Updates as HighScores do RuneScape-Like Forums (Made 100% by us with RuneScape Website features)[/COLOR]
[Spoiler=Media for Website]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/idoLm.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AynT1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QbBrZ.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yBLWs.png[/img]
[/Spoiler]
[COLOR="Cyan"]~Frost blades[/COLOR]

item.title: Frost blades - Simply the best
item.dc:creator: @OwnerViper OwnerViper
item.description:
@OwnerViper wrote:

[CENTER]

Play Now
Hiscores
Community
YouTube

[/CENTER]

[COLOR=teal]Features:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=teal]Frost blades server:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=magenta]- We are a brand new Economically based server, We have thousands of features, a ‘perfect’ pvp system, Loyalty programme, and much more![/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]PvP/Pking:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]- We have a PERFECTED Pvp sysem

  • We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking
  • Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds)
  • Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more.
  • Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]PvM:
[/COLOR][COLOR=blue]- King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects

  • Tormented Demons with all 3 switches
  • Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless)
  • Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon)
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Barrows
  • All other God-wars bosses!
  • Duel arena
  • Castle Wars[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]PvP And PvM:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]- Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless

  • Switching better than RS
  • Full Summoning!!
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)[/COLOR]

[COLOR=cyan][SIZE=5]Grand Exchange[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]- MySql Database - like RuneScape

  • Saves offers on logout - like RuneScape
  • Able to exchange offers when one player is offline, e.g have different timezone trading - like RuneScape
  • Fixed prices for every item - like RuneScape[/COLOR]

[COLOR=red][SIZE=5]Highscores[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]- Can Search a player on the search box - Like RuneScape

  • Works for EVERY skills - like RuneScape
  • Can compare your skills with other players skills
  • Bringing minigames to it soon, like Duel Arena rating[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]Skills:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]- Attack

  • Strength
  • Defence
  • Ranged
  • Magic
  • RuneCrafting
  • Construction
  • Dungeoneering - Proper Tokens system and a shop!
  • Constitution
  • Agility
  • Herblore
  • Thieving
  • Crafting
  • Fletching
  • Slayer
  • Hunter
  • Mining
  • Smithing
  • Fishing
  • Cooking
  • FireMaking
  • WoodCutting[/COLOR]
    [COLOR=blue]- Farming[/COLOR]
    [COLOR=blue]- Summoning[/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue]Monsters:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]- TzTok-Jad

  • Haar’Aken
  • WildyWyem
  • Ice Strykewyrm
  • Glacors
  • Kalphite Queen
  • Kree’Arra
  • Nex
  • General Graardor
  • Commander Zilyana
  • K’ril Tsutsaroth
  • Frost Dragons
  • King Black Dragon
  • Dagannoth Kings
  • Corporeal Beast
  • Tormented Deamons[/COLOR]
    [COLOR=blue]- Queen Black Dragon[/color]

[COLOR=blue]Minigames:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]- Barrows

  • Castle Wars
  • Combat Titans (Custom minigame)
  • Dominion Tower
  • Duel Arena
  • Fight Pits
  • Warriors guild[/COLOR]
    [COLOR=blue]- Soul Wars
  • Tzhaar Fight Caves (All 64 Waves, the 64th wave is for the kiln cape but is optional.)
  • Fight Pits[/COLOR]
    [COLOR=blue]- Pest Control[/COLOR]
    [COLOR=blue]- Clan Wars[/COLOR]

[SPOILER=MiniGames Pictures]

[/SPOILER]

[COLOR=blue]Others:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]

  • Grave Stones
  • Frost points - Points you can use to buy items, can be obtained through various activities on the server.
  • More Auras
  • Decanting
  • Flasks - Potions with 6 Doses.
  • Bones-on-Altar
  • Effigies
  • Full Quick Chat
  • All Spells in the ancients Spell book
  • Trading
  • Dicing
  • Curses & Prayers
  • Perfect combat, 100% flawless
  • Armour set effects all added
  • Flawless Music & Sound system
  • Full Completionists cape[/COLOR]
